column3: X X X X X Escort T/O Room left the classroom and eloped to the playground. He refused to wear a mask and refused to reenter the building. When returning
column4: he became physically aggressive outside of the classroom. rolled around on the floor and then continued to be physically aggressive. Staff utilized an escort to the time out room was in the time out room from 45. He was still aggressive so he went back in from He came out and sat on the floor for a few minutes until he was ready to put on his shoes and harness. He walked to the bus for dismissal at 2:10.

column3: X X X was walking to his bus with classroom staff. He ran away from classroom staff to the playground and began playing. Staff utilized a small child hold to keep safe on the equipment. He then walked to the bus with staff for dismissal. called 's mom and had her on speaker phone.
X X X X X Time out: Intervention: Small child Escort/hold eloped during social studies and had unsafe behavior (running through hallways
column4: attempting to get outside). When asked to put on a mask
column5: he refused. then tried to run outside and the time out room was utilized. continued to be unsafe in the t/o room. We tried to transition to the bus and ran around the school and parking lot. was escorted to the bus and held until being puton.

column3: X X attempted to elope when prompted to sign on his computer for iready. He then laid on the floor in the classroom
column4: kicking the door. He refused to wear a mask. He became unsafe with a computer mouse (flipping it around
column5: swinging it at staff). Staff escorted to the TO room.
